Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivePanel
    Panel currently showing in Frame
    BoardPanel
    Panel containing the board and its functionality
    ChooseGodPanel
    panel displayed when the user has to select one or more god cards from a list of available gods
    ChooseNicknamePanel
    Panel used when the user connects to the server and has to enter his nickname
    ConnectionClosedPanel
    Panel displayed when the connection with server is closed
    GameOverPanel
    panel displayed when the game ends, notifies user if he has won or lost
    GamePanel
    Panel shown to the user after god selection, it is used when the players place their workers and remains active until the game ends.
    GUI
    graphical-user interface, this class controls all the panels shown to the user, and notifies client-side controller when the user performs some operation
    SelectLobbySizePanel
    panel displayed to the first user to enter a lobby.
    WelcomeImg
    Panel containing welcome image
    WelcomePanel  
    WinLooseJFrame
